name: Grumpy Cars
description:
Grumpy Cars is a 3D toon car game. The player’s goal is to survive the enemy’s waves. There are two ways to eliminate the attackers, crashing them or using strange weapons spread in the arena. You can also push the opponents out of the map. Unlock and customize your cars. And remember… You can’t stop your car in the arenas!

FEATURES:
- Free to Play (no in-game purchase, no ADS)
- Choose among various type of cars
- Drive in strange and different arenas
- Customize and upgrade your car to fight against powerful bosses
- Use your experience to climb the shared online leaderboards
- Local Co-Op multiplayer (Split-screen)
- Built-in anti-cheat
- New contents and features will come with future updates

GAMEPLAY:
- Five different types of inputs (including touch control for 2in1 devices)
- Save the round e exit. You can load the previous game using in-game credits

WIKI (follow the initial tutorial and consult the wiki in the game):
- Each arena is different and particular
- Each car has unique characteristics. The fastest is also the least resistant
- Pay attention to the environment. Crashing into walls will make you lose life
- When the car lights blink yellow, it's time to escape

- Each PowerUp offers special bonuses:
- 404: enemy cars lose you and roam in the arena for a limited time
- EMP: turn off all enemy cars for a limited time
- Giant bowling ball: drop giant bowling balls on the map
- Fire: set part of the map on fire by burning enemies for a limited period of time
- Oil: throw engine oil on the asphalt sowing your chaser
- Giant bomb: drop a giant bomb that causes huge long-range damage
- Grenade: a small but powerful grenade that causes short-range damage
- Machine gun: fast bursts of shots against enemy cars
- Rocket: powerful bullet that causes area damage
- Life: restore maximum health
- Star: you become invincible for a limited period of time
- Ice: temporarily freezes enemies in a slippery ice cube

If You enjoy our game, please rate and submit your feedbacks for further improvements.
